thread.section_title: AirportRentals.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirportRentals.com | www.airportrentals.com | 2 of 189
thread.title: Jørn

author: Jørn
title: Jørn
text:
With AirportRentals you can compare prices easily and quickly.
For us it was very easy to select a rental company (Avis) and car (4WD, a Jeep Grand Cherokee or similar). And via a link we made a reservation. So far, so good.
BUT when we stood at the Avis desk after arrival we realized that the company didn't know anything at all about our reservation, which means that Avis actually could have run out of 4WD cars.
There were enough cars, though, but there wasn't a Jeep available. Instead we got a Hyundai Santa Fe - which is alright, it's a fine car.
I'll forgive the clerk for trying to "sell" us a fancy Cadillac Escalade.
But should I forgive him for knowing absolutely nothing about tyres when we asked - and we did, becauce we were going into the mountains?
Having come to a foreign country we wanted of course a GPS. The clerk didn't tell you (or he didn't know) that there was a fine GPS in the Hyundai. Sitting in the car we realized this and we wanted to cancel the additional GPS ordered. Back in the office, meeting the clerk, he accepted the cancellation.
When we returned the car we were in a hurry and didn't notice that there was a GPS put on the bill! We have paid CAD 199,95 for it!
We don't blame AirportRentals for this.
But we definitely blame Avis, and we are now trying to get our money back!
